meanings.definition: The quality or state of being stately.
meanings.sent1: The statelinesses of the old mansion impressed visitors.
meanings.sent2: The queen's gown exuded statelinesses during the royal ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to mimic the statelinesses of a lion but ended up looking silly.
meanings.sent4: The mountain peak stood with the statelinesses of a king overlooking his kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The statelinesses of the ancient castle left a lasting impression on all who visited.

meanings.sent1: The ballroom was decorated with statelinesses fit for a royal event.
meanings.sent2: The statelinesses of the opera house captivated the audience.
meanings.sent3: The clown attempted to perform with statelinesses but only managed to cause laughter.
meanings.sent4: The statelinesses of the sunset painted the sky in hues of gold and pink.
meanings.sent5: The grand ballroom shimmered with the statelinesses of crystal chandeliers and velvet drapes.
